testcase.classname: Account creation and sign-in on Magento
testcase.name: Create an account and sign in
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the Magento homepage.......................................passed When user navigate to the "Create an Account" page..........................passed And user fill in the account creation form with the following details:......passed And user click on the "Create an Account" button............................passed Then user should see a confirmation message that my account has been created.passed When user navigate to the Sign In page......................................passed And user fill in the login form with the following details:.................passed And user click on the "Sign In" button......................................passed Then user should be signed in successfully..................................passed
